title: What value does a music degree has in music industry? - Quora

response.answer_text: It matters if you want to teach someone... Or Have an edge over someone when you are trying to play sessions for a well known music producer or director....  To me, to be Frank it does not matter.... I'd you can read the grand staff it's an edge you have over others.. But does not talk about the talent you have... It's a form of art... You are not valued by the number of degrees or grades you have... It's the final product that matters....  It doesn't matter what degrees your sculpturer has.. As long as the sculpture is admirable and beautiful...  Mostly depends on what you want to be A music scholar... It will matter a lot A musician..... Your talent matters..music degree is only an edge on paper
